Rendering Charts

2018-04-24

Source: vignettes/render.Rmd

The vegalite() function sets up the rendering process.

  • chart: Chart specification
  • tooltip: Tooltip specification
  • embed: Embedding specification
  • width, height: Chart dimensions

Talk about buildings and plots of land.

Talk about automatic sizing of charts, but only single charts.

Chart specification

Tooltip

Embedding specificaiton

Let’s look at a basic chart with default embedding:

library("altair")

plot_basic <-
  alt$Chart(
    data = r_to_py(mtcars) 
  )$encode(
    x = "mpg:Q",
    y = "hp:Q",
    color = "cyl:N"
  )$mark_point()

vegalite(plot_basic, height = 200, width = 500)
vegalite(plot_basic, embed = vega_embed(actions = FALSE))
vegalite(
  plot_basic, 
  embed = vega_embed(renderer = "svg", actions = only_actions(export = TRUE))
)
